definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The paint has visible gestures, it is human, it moves.
sentences.chinese: 画有看得见的姿态，它是人性的，是灵动的。

sentences.english: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 听到非法防守？若苍林之优雅，似碧海之灵动。

sentences.english: Like the rhythm of these paintings.
sentences.chinese: 挺喜欢这种装饰画，很有灵动的气息。

sentences.english: This picture scroll fluent, exquisitely clever lines accurate, full of expression.
sentences.chinese: 这幅长卷线条准确流畅，工细灵动，充满表现力。

sentences.english: It also gives a sense of spirituality and encourages creativity.
sentences.chinese: 它也给人一种灵动的感觉，鼓励创造性。

sentences.english: To seek the intelligence is an important way to the poetic flavor of the language offictions.
sentences.chinese: 对灵动性的追求是小说语言走向诗化的一个重要途径。

sentences.english: The girl fingers smart, play the melody.
sentences.chinese: 那个女生手指灵动，弹奏出美妙的旋律。

sentences.english: The resilient decorative line dotted panel color adds vitality and dynamic power.
sentences.chinese: 灵动饰条点缀面板色彩，更添动感活力。

sentences.english: With clever text, through all the five continents and colorful.
sentences.chinese: 伴随灵动的文字，穿越多彩的五洲四海。

sentences.english: The deep is dark, but not silent; it’s alive with sounds.
sentences.chinese: 深海是黑暗的但不安静;因为有声音变得灵动。

sentences.english: The solid white skirt Ju that an refinement works properly brushes past a white jade rank, green jade wooden railing.
sentences.chinese: 一袭飘逸灵动的纯白裙裾掠过白玉石阶，青玉阑干。

definition: charm or grace (in poetry or art)
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
